title: my most recent ranked game...
body:
I played leona. I was walking along river dropping a few wards wirh my adc close behind. We come across dragon to see 2 low health enemies almost done killing,dragon. I use my ult (which i just got cause i was lvl 6) and kill dragon. Kill an enemy, and get an assist.

anyone else have that one move you used that one time that just made you feel like a boss?
